ygData.subject: Re: Selos Accelerando
ygData.msgSnippet: This is something I ve also noticed, but I don t think it s Verant purposely slowing us down. I think it has more to do with lag, and number of users in a
ygData.messageBody:
This is something I've also noticed, but I don't think it's Verant purposely
slowing us down.

I think it has more to do with lag, and number of users in a zone. I know
when I am in a zone with few players, I zip over hills and dunes as thought
I were flying a Snowspeeder from Empire Strikes Back.

But the minute I hit a zone with 90+ people in it, it sure does seem like
Selo's loses some of it's gas.

Tallonn

-----Original Message-----
From: dave@... <dave@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, July 15, 1999 12:14 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Selos Accelerando


>From: <dave@...>
>
>
>I am writing to the fellow bards to see if anyone has noticed
>that Selos Accelerando has slowed to a crawl (relatively =) even
>when we have the drum equipped! ... I have been having a rather
>large amount of connection problems so I am not quite sure if
>it has been slowed indeed or my 40% average PL (my fault, router
>is going bad) is the culprit.
>
>Maeldar Goldenhawk
>Level 28th Bard of the Tarew Marr realm.
>
